Document.name: GlobalStorage
Document.summary: Base type of all global storages. A global storage stores multiple values using a name. The "BEGIN_GLOBAL_STOREGE_CLASS" macro is recommended to create a global storage.
Document.remarks: All values are shared like global variables, but they are created at the first time when they need to be accessed. is recommended after you don't need any global storages any more, it frees memory.
